opinion: I would recommend to any who is looking for a nice dinner out
You're doing yourself a very serious disservice if you don't try L&M's lobster!
Its my go-to place when I have friends in town
best NY strip I have ever had
Right at the entrance to the gaslamp district
best dinner we have experienced in San Diego
If you have never truly understood melt in your mouth steak , then L&Ms will usher you into that ensconced shrine of belief
